Question.Subject: Blocking on Formspring.me?
Question.Content:
I learned that by clicking the "Spam" button on a question on Formspring, it apparently will block the person (or so the site says). I was wondering if anyone knew if this holds true even if the user is anonymous? Will it block their IP address or something?
Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
It will block the IP address. When they try to ask another question, it wills say invalid request - to make it look like it's just an error and they are not blocked. They can unblock themselves by resetting their internet or going on another computer.
When they ask non-anonymous then it blocks their username.
When they ask anonymous, it blocks their IP because other than that their is no way to identify them.
